thread.section_title: Right Channel Radios Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Right Channel Radios | www.rightchannelradios.com | 4 of 86
thread.title: Douglas Strack
thread.title_full: Right Channel Radios reviewed by Douglas Strack

author: Douglas Strack
title: Douglas Strack
text: I purchased the 4 foot Firestik kit and it had every thing I needed to install my cb radio. Love the product, but the amount of helpful information they provide you is worth almost as much as the kit. I recommend these guys to everyone I know.
